name: Roller Joe 3D
description:
Roller Joe 3D is an awesome combination of 2D and 3D action. The game is controlled like a 2D platform game but with a cool twist that adds the 3rd dimension. You’ll collect coins to unlock clever designed levels. Remember to team up with your friends, because some of the later levels are split screen Multiplayer.  Near  "The end", you'll unlock the The Magic Glasses... (?)

The Journey Split-screen Multiplayer

RollerJoe3D is free while in development (probably forever ;) but I’ll recommend downloading the game now while It’s still free ;)

The beginning..

...::: Controles :::...

  • Arrowkeys or AWSD - move and jump
  • RETURN - Reset Level
  • ESC - Exit to the menu
  • Mouse - Navigate in the menu
  • Splitscreen Multiplayer keys:
    • Arrowkeys - Player 1 movement
    • AWSD - Player 2 movement

Stuff to unlock:

  • Tutorial Levels
  • Basic Levels
  • The Journey
  • The Castle
  • 2gether
  • Magic Glasses
  • The End (One Level)
"Hi I’m Joe I live in a world of puzzles and I love jumping around to collect coins, riding rails, push blocks and roll balls. There is some coins I love to collect more then others. I love to collect the magic coins, they are so special because funny stuff happens when touching them. I remember someday long time ago I collected a magic coin and I felt so happy, so warm inside, I felt I could flye... I really wish I could find a coin like that again..."
